## Special characters

Some characters are somewhat difficult to write on the Czech keyboard:

| Character | Shortcut  | Alterantive |
|-----------|-----------|-------------|
| \#        | Alt + 35  | Alt + x     |
| $         | Alt + 36  | Alt + ů     |
| &         | Alt + 38  | Alt + c     |
| ~         | Alt + 126 | Alt + +     |
| \|        |           | Alt + w     |
| >         |           | Alt + .     |
| {}        |           | Alt + b/n   |
| []        |           | Alt + f/g   |
| `         |           | Alt + ý + Space |
| ^         | Alt + 94  |             |


## RStudio shortcuts

| Sign/Action      | Shortcut         |
|------------------|------------------|
| ->               | Ctrl + Alt + -   |
| %>%              | Ctrl + Shift + m |
| run selected row | Ctrl + Enter     |
| run whole script | Ctrl + Shift + Enter |
